channel.title: Jordan Peterson Guest Appearances & Highlights (Extended)
channel.description: An extended custom playlist of podcasts featuring Jordan Peterson, with prioritized guest appearances on shows like The Joe Rogan Experience and Your Mom's House.
channel.itunes:author: Generated Playlist

item.title: The Joe Rogan Experience #1769 - Dr. Jordan Peterson
item.description: Dr. Jordan B. Peterson is a clinical psychologist and professor emeritus at the University of Toronto. He returns to the JRE to discuss a wide range of topics.

item.title: The Joe Rogan Experience #1139 - Jordan Peterson
item.description: One of the most popular and impactful conversations between Joe Rogan and Jordan Peterson, covering meaning, chaos, order, and personal responsibility.

item.title: Your Mom's House Ep. 685 - Dr. Jordan Peterson
item.description: Dr. Jordan Peterson joins Tom Segura and Christina P for a fascinating and often humorous conversation on the Your Mom's House podcast.

item.title: Lex Fridman Podcast #313 - Jordan Peterson: Life, Death, Power, Fame, and Meaning
item.description: A deep and wide-ranging conversation between Lex Fridman and Jordan Peterson, covering fundamental aspects of the human condition.

item.title: The Ben Shapiro Show: Sunday Special Ep. 16 - Jordan Peterson
item.description: Jordan Peterson sits down with Ben Shapiro for a Sunday Special, discussing politics, culture, and the philosophical underpinnings of Western society.

item.title: The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast - S4 E60: A The-O-Logy of The Simpsons | The Pageau Brothers
item.description: Dr. Peterson is joined by Jonathan and Matthieu Pageau to analyze the deep theological and symbolic structures present in the popular animated series, The Simpsons.

item.title: The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast - S4 E45: Douglas Murray | The War on the West
item.description: Jordan Peterson and Douglas Murray discuss the themes from Murray's book "The War on the West," exploring the cultural and intellectual attacks on Western traditions.

item.title: The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast - Biblical Series II: Genesis 1 - Chaos & Order
item.description: The second lecture in the Biblical Series. Dr. Peterson delves into the first chapter of Genesis, analyzing the concepts of chaos and order as foundational principles of reality.

item.title: The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast - Biblical Series I: Introduction to the Idea of God
item.description: The first lecture in Dr. Peterson's highly popular psychological lecture series on the book of Genesis. This episode sets the stage for the entire series.

item.title: Modern Wisdom 433 - Jordan Peterson - How To Fix Your Life
item.description: Chris Williamson hosts Dr. Jordan Peterson for a practical and insightful discussion on taking personal responsibility, overcoming adversity, and constructing a meaningful life.
